text: Hey David I’m on the CTA team at HubSpot, I’m not able to recreate this issue myself, is there a CTA on that page that’s dropping the `r` param and I can have a look?

I could be wrong, but I think you need to change this part ("or" should be "||")
```{% dnd_section
 background_color={{ context.background_color || "#f8fafc" }}
%}```

Hello. I'm trying to use i18n in a module but I'm not able to. I'm using the boilerplate: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react/tree/main/examples/hello-world>.
I've used i18n in several React projects before, but I'm having trouble with it here.

I import '../i18n.js'; inside the layout.jsx file" and within my component I call the import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; But I get the error: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'useContext')

Has anyone experienced this before or can provide me with any tips/documentation explaining how this should be done?
